VIII.iv.2.B.2.a
.
Record Group 92, MACR
Record Group 92
,
Missing Air Crew Reports (MACR)
, in the records of the Quartermaster General, provides information regarding
air crashes, and
subsequent captures.
title: M21-1, Part VIII, Subpart iv, Chapter 2, Section B - Former Prisoner of War (FPOW) Service Records
citation: Part VIII, Subpart iv, Chapter 2, Section B
